title._content: Image taken from page 228 of 'Statement respecting the Earl of Selkirk's settlement of Kildonan, upon the Red River in North America: its destruction in the years 1815 and 1816; and the massacre of Governor Semple and his party'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Statement respecting the Earl of Selkirk's settlement of Kildonan, upon the Red River in North America: its destruction in the years 1815 and 1816; and the massacre of Governor Semple and his party" Author: DOUGLAS, Thomas - Earl of Selkirk Contributor: Halkett, John. Contributor: SEMPLE, Robert - Governor of the Red River Colony Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS B.494.(6.)", "British Library HMNTS 1061.i.8."
